text: The Red Eyes are a pack of [[clawfeet|clawfoot]] in the [[Talenta Plains]] which are possessed by [[fiendish spirits|fiend]]. The Talenta [[halfling]]s avoid their hunting grounds, but perhaps the beasts' territory suddenly shifts, and a halfling nomad asks the player characters to help them fend off the demonic creatures. Alternately, a Talenta adventurer could wish to recover the weapon of a legendary hunter who fell fighting the pack.
title: Red Eyes
tooltip: pack of demonic clawfeet in the Talenta Plains
